title: Cold Flat Junction
description: In this sequel to Hotel Paradise, twelve-year-old sleuth Emma Graham continues her obsessive search for answers to the "accidental" drowning of a young girl forty years ago in Spirit Lake. With its once fashionable, now fading resort hotel and dead-end dirt roads, Spirit Lake is the sinister center of intricate suspense and singular characters. The Washington Post Book World calls Emma Graham "utterly engaging". Cold Flat Junction is a delicate yet excruciating view of the decisions a young girl must make on her way to becoming an adult.
author: Martha Grimes
